attributes.action: Open the 2012 Olympics Games with 2012 Morris dancers and David Beckham on lead sticks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Open the 2012 Olympic Games with a troop of 2012 Morris Dancers, ideally accompanied by David Beckham (2008 Olympic ACE) on lead sticks and (Queen) Victoria on May Pole duty.

Also, please make Morris dancing an official Olympic sport and guarantee a gold medal for the deserving East End massive & Pearly Queens dispalced by the great East London re-build. 

Please sign this petition and help stomp a great British tradition on to the world sporting stage.

Make 2012 a true photo finish with PhotoBox.

Thanks,
Ben

Game on Boris / Come on Gordon!

rejection.details: This is a matter for London 2012 Organising Committee (http://www.london-2012.co.uk/LOCOG/) whom you may wish to contact with your suggestion.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
